Text: The full version. That's what '+ Crack' means in the description...

I'm sorry, @jsingh but I don't use this app myself and don't have it installed. 

I can only suggest that you try installing the 'templates' .exe file first, then do the xara installation. If that doesn't help, let me know and I'll install xara on my machine and see if I can work out what's going wrong for you.

Also, you might try xara's problem page here:

http://support.xara.com/index.php?_m=knowledgebase&_a=view&parentcategoryid=477

OK, @jsingh, I think I've solved your problem.

 The templates.exe file that came with this is faulty for some reason. What I did was I opened Xara, clicked on 'help', then clicked on 'download templates'. 

A download will start automatically (a 157 MB exe.file from Xara). When completed, double-click on this file and it will install automatically.

Now open Xara, click on 'file', click on 'new from design gallery' and you should see a whole shitload of 'themes' (complete multi-page website templates). Now delete the downloaded .exe file and the old templates .exe file.

Hope this helped.

Verified clean w/ NOD32. Installed perfectly using artpepper's instructions appearing above. Thanks much for the Upload!

(Simmo3749) Uninstall any previous installation attempts, then run a registry cleaner to remove any leftover xara stuff. Then  1. unplug from the internet. 2. Install program, but DO NOT start it up 3. Copy the Patch into the Xara directory (C:\Program Files\Xara\Xara Web Designer 6) 4. Apply the patch 5. Re-connect internet 6. Start up the program (if it asks you to register, Don't) 7. On the menu bar of Xara click on "Help", then Download Templates. You should be good-to-go!
